author: kschenk
msg: Tweaked top margin for "actionstatements" to line up with "news" when no alert active.

author: kschenk
msg: Changed alert box styling to stay over first column to quit overwriting news column.

author: nick
msg: For places where an ordered collection is created and used within the context of a single thread, and there are no thread safety concerns, use ArrayList not Vector. See bug #54838

author: markrmiller
msg: SOLR-6274: UpdateShardHandler should log the params used to configure it's HttpClient.

author: robbie
msg: QPIDJMS-24: redirect test output to file, allowing use of -Dmaven.test.redirectTestOutputToFile=false to restore console output if desired
